leadership.title: Our Leadership
leadership.subtitle: Meet the visionary leaders driving our success and innovation forward
leadership.downloadHint: Complete directory of our management team and specialists

persons.name: Askar Salymbekov
persons.bio: Visionary leader with over 20 years of experience in business development and strategic planning. Founded multiple successful enterprises across various industries.
achievements: Pioneered innovative business models in Central Asia
Mentored 100+ young entrepreneurs and business leaders

persons.name: Samarbek Zhaparakunov
persons.bio: Seasoned executive with expertise in operational excellence and digital transformation. Passionate about building high-performance teams and sustainable business practices.
achievements: Led digital transformation across all business units

persons.name: Ainura Askarova
persons.bio: Financial strategist with 15+ years in corporate finance and investment management. Specialized in financial planning and risk management strategies.

persons.name: Bakyt Zhamankulov
persons.bio: Technology innovator with background in software engineering and digital infrastructure. Focused on leveraging cutting-edge technologies for business growth.
achievements: Led development of proprietary technology platforms
Reduced infrastructure costs by 30% through optimization
Built and scaled engineering team from 10 to 50+ specialists
